column1: Smoque BBQ////Let me begin by saying.....I live on the westside of Chicago.  There are several places with excellent BBQ ribs on my side of town
column2: but I've heard rave reviews about Smoque so my husband and we decided to stop in when we were in the area over the holidays.  I hate to say that I was sorely disappointed.  We ordered Baby Backs and St. Louis ribs.  They were not to our liking.  Although very tender
column3: I was not crazy about the taste.  I didn't get that "smoqued" flavor I crave from the grill.  What happened to that?  This is another place I can mark off my list.....I tried it.
